name: Citrullus
description: The Citrullus resembles a normal melon plant while motionless, with sticky juices and viny tendrils that can ensnare enemies.
memorable: It can disguise itself as a common plant and restrain foes with sticky juice or viny tendrils.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting creatures and control the battlefield.
relations: Could be found in the company of other plants or creatures in ambush tactics.
environment: Often found in grassy or overgrown areas where it can blend in.
strengths: Impressive physical strength makes its bite attack lethal; possesses abilities to restrain foes.
attacks: Uses a powerful bite that combines piercing and acid damage; can spray acid in a cone to harm and restrain multiple foes.
most_powerful_ability: Bile Spray creates a large area of effect to damage and restrain multiple enemies.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 30 feet, allowing it to sense creatures without sight.
additional_information: Can remain motionless to avoid detection.
Forces attackers to make saving throws when taking bludgeoning damage.
Can drag restrained creatures closer with its Creeping Seedlings.
Immunities to acid provide resilience in specific combat situations.
Features a high Strength score for effective melee attacks.
